title: Fentanyl - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/19/19
itunes:title: Fentanyl - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/19/19
description:
George Noory and investigative journalist Ben Westhoff discuss his work exploring the explosion of fentanyl and other synthetic drugs coming from China that is leading to the deadly opioid epidemic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
